comment.description: Read-only state consumed during device provisioning

deviceId.title: ID for the device in the cloud fleet
deviceId.description: Used by balena-device-register for initial provisioning.

deviceArch.title: Device architecture
deviceArch.description: Currently unused. The supervisor has an implicit architecture so it does not need this.

deviceType.title: Device type, must be supported by the fleet
deviceType.descriptioin: Used by the supervisor and balena-device-register on initial provisioning

initialDeviceName.title: Define a device name used when provisioning
initialDeviceName.description: Used by the supervisor on provisioning

apiKey.title: Initial cloud provisioning API key
apiKey.description: Used by balena-device-register on initial provisioning

uuid.title: Device unique identifier
uuid.description: Used on balena-device-register on provisioning, API communications and VPN setup

apiEndpoint.title: Balena API URI
apiEndpoint.description: Used on balena-device-register on provisioning and API communications

deltaEndpoint.title: Balena delta API endpoint URI
deltaEndpoint.description: Used on engine startup as configuration

registered_at.title: Time of registration in seconds since the epoch

mixpanelToken.title: Mixpanel token for event reporting
mixpanelToken.description: Used on supervisor startup as configuration

comment.title: Configuration where the device value is the source of truth

secureboot.title: Secure boot
secureboot.description: Enable secure boot and full-disk encryption during installation

udevRules.title: Custom udev rules pairs
udevRules.description: To turn a rule into the required format, `cat rulefilename | jq -sR .`

udevRules.64:
ACTION!="add|change", GOTO="modeswitch_rules_end"
KERNEL=="ttyACM*", ATTRS{idVendor}=="1546", ATTRS{idProduct}=="1146", TAG+="systemd", ENV{SYSTEMD_WANTS}="u-blox-switch@'%E{DEVNAME}'.service"
LBEL="modeswitch_rules_end"

sshKeys.title: Public SSH keys used for SSH server authentication
sshKeys.description: An array of strings containing a list of public SSH keys used for SSH server authentication.

randomMacAddressScan.title: MAC address randomization
randomMacAddressScan.description: Enabled MAC address randomization of Wifi devices during scanning

uri.title: Network connectivity check URL
uri.description: URL to query for network connectivity checks. Defaults to `$API_ENDPOINT/connectivity-check`. This URL should return the `X-NetworkManager-Status` header with a value of `online`

interval.title: Network connectivity check interval in seconds
interval.description: Network connectivity check interval in seconds. The default is 300s and 0 disables it.

response.title: Expected HTTP body response from the connectivity server. If missing, the default is `NetworkManager is online`. If empty, the server is expected to answer with status code 204 or send no data.

comment.description: Configuration values where the cloud is the source of truth

hostname.title: Configured hostname of the device. If empty, the UUID will be used.
hostname.description: Used by balena-hostname to set the system's hostname

appUpdatePollInterval.title: Supervisor cloud polling interval in minutes, defauls to 60000. Should be moved to supervisor database.
appUpdatePollInterval.description: Used by the supervidor. TBC whether it could go into db.

instantUpdates.title: If disabled the supervisor will ignore instant update requests on the `v1/update` endpoint, defaults to true

bootstrapRetryDelay.title: Delay to retry provisioning, defaults to 30000

persistentLogging.title: Enable or disable persistent logging on the device.
persistentLogging.description: Defaults to false. Once enabled, they are stored in the device's data partition, located in `/var/log/journal/<uuid>`, where 'uuid' is the device's unique identifier.

deviceApiKey.title: API token key
deviceApiKey.description: Used by device registration and VPN setup

deviceApiKeys.title: API token keys array
deviceApiKeys.description: Internal state used by os-config. Should move out of config.json into state or supervisor

ntpServers.title: Network Time Protocol servers
ntpServers.description: Space separated list of NTP server URLs used for time symchornization. Defaults to four `resinio.pool.ntp.org` servers

dnsServers.title: Domain Name Servers
dnsServers.description: Space separated list of DNS servers addresses used for name resolutioni to add to those obtained via DHCP or available in a NetworkManager connection profile. If not defined or empty, Google DNS server is used (8.8.8.8). If set to 'null', no default servers are added.

balenaRootCA.title: CA certificate
balenaRootCA.description: Base64 encoded PEM CA certificate to install into the device's root trust store. It makes the device trust TSL/SSL certificated from this authority. Useful when behind a re-encrypting network device like a transparent proxy or deep packet inspection device.

apiTimeout.title: Timeout for the local supervisor API in seconds
apiTimeout.description: Used by the supervisor, TBC could it be stored in db.

developmentMode.title: Enable / disable development mode
developmentMode.description: Development mode enables unauthenticated SSH logins unles custom SSH keys are present, as well as enabling serial console passwordless login and exposing the engine socket externally.

localMode.title: Enable / disable local development mode for on device application development
localMode.description: For future use as initial default, currently unused.

vpnPort.title: Port used for the VPN tunnel.

country.title: The country the device is operating on, used for setting the WiFi regulatory domain.
country.description: ISO/IEC 3166-1 alpha2 country code to set the initial regulatory domain setting for IEEE 802.11 devices

listenPort.title: Local port for the supervisor API to listen on
listenPort.description: Used on supervisor startup as configuration
